topics.body:
"@CogWeaver":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538e96366368721dbcf60500#post_538e96366368721dbcf60500
He made a reference to mlp and one of the people that help with the show came into the shot and said, "Wait didn't you already make this joke?"
"I don't know the scientific explanation for it, but every time I say the word 'pony' the viewership goes up"
"Really?"
"Pony"
122,000 views
"Pony"
1,000,000 views
*looks at each other
"Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony. Pony."

Hmm well those two don't work. . I know, "Hentai"

Damn I guess this does work after all, "Hentai!  Hentai!  Hentai!  Hentai! Hentai!-"
